profile_data.summary:
I hold a Master's degree in business analytics from Drexel University in Philadelphia, and I am an accomplished Data Analyst with a tenure of three years at Wells Fargo. In my current role, I analyze large and complex data sets, utilizing data modeling, SQL, and data manipulation skills. 

My professional acumen has enabled Wells Fargo to better understand our customers, leading to financial growth of $1M by identifying changes to assortment, distribution, and marketing through financial and behavioral analysis. Additionally, I design and execute A/B tests for evaluating the effectiveness of various marketing strategies, product features, and website optimizations. 

To convey my findings, I use Python, Tableau, and other business intelligence tools to present data-driven insights and strategic implications to senior management for informed decision-making. I have been recognized for my ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams, delivering projects on time and within budget using agile methodology and data quality standards. 

I am passionate about identifying solutions to complex problems and creating value for the organization. I hold multiple certifications in data analytics, including Learning Data Analytics: 1 Foundation issued by LinkedIn. I am proficient in Excel, Snowflake Cloud, Adobe Analytics, and Google Analytics, and I possess strong attention to detail and analytical skills, which are integral to my success.
profile_data.headline: Data Analyst @ Wells Fargo || Analysis, SQL, Tableau, ETL, Data Pipelines, Data Modeling, Azure Data Factory, KPIs, Data Visualization and Reporting, Dashboard, Financial Analysis and Business Analysis

experience.description:
 Optimized credit card approval processes, achieving a 15% reduction in decision time through project collaboration.
 Utilized Python and SQL for data extraction, cleaning, and transformation, ensuring data accuracy and integrity.
 Created interactive and dynamic Tableau dashboards incorporating parameterized filters for real-time data exploration and analysis.
 Engineered and deployed scalable ETL pipelines using Apache Airflow, automating data workflows, and reducing processing time by 20%.
 Conducted in-depth EAD on customer spending patterns using SQL queries and advanced Excel functions, identifying trends and anomalies.
 Employed advanced statistical hypothesis testing, including chi-square and t-tests, to validate findings and support data-driven decision-making.
 Defined and tracked KPIs for credit card approval processes, ensuring alignment with business goals and facilitating data-driven decision-making.
 Built financial models in Excel to analyse credit risk scenarios, incorporating sensitivity analysis and scenario planning for risk mitigation.
experience.title: Data Analyst

experience.description:
 Analysed population health trends, using SQL for data extraction and Python (Pandas) for data manipulation. 
 Involved in the development of a predictive model (utilizing scikit-learn) to forecast healthcare resource utilization, contributing to a 10% cost reduction.
 Implemented a Power BI dashboard system for tracking and reporting on healthcare quality metrics.
 Utilized Python (Pandas, NumPy) and SQL for EDA, extracting valuable insights from complex healthcare datasets. 
 Implemented changes based on A/B test results, leading to a 15% improvement in patient outcomes and a 10% reduction in treatment costs.
 Integrated Electronic Health Record (EHR) data into analytical workflows, ensuring a comprehensive view of patient health.
 Utilized process mining tools to visualize and quantify workflow inefficiencies, leading to a 20% improvement in patient experience.
experience.title: Data Analyst
